channel.title: words on Dheepak's blog
channel.description: Recent content in words on Dheepak's blog

item.title: The Kangaroo Words
item.description: A kangaroo word is a word that contains all the letters of one of its synonyms, called a joey word, arranged so that these letters appear in the same order in both words. For example - in[flammable], [malign]ant, [ma]scu[l]in[e] Source: Wikipedia

item.title: Phygital
item.description: The combination of the physical and digital tools results in “Phygital”. This morph word suggests that the success in the future of marketing depends on creating an ecosystem between the company and its customers that involves both the digital and physical space. Source: wikipedia
